Predicted price range for Amazon.com Inc Our trading algorithm values Amazon.com Inc (AMZN) to be strongly overvalued.
The red lines in this plot symbolize the changepoints of the price, meaning that the trend or direction changed, either from a down to an uptrend, or the other way around.
Name Value Our valuation strongly overvalued Current trend downtrend Buy/Sell Recommendation Strong Sell Current Price $115.06 60 Day Prediction $90.01 60 Day Pred - Lower Bound $80.54 60 Day Pred - Upper Bound $99.78 Our algorithm predicts the future trend with the linear formula (a*x + b = y):
$ price = -0.183 * nr_days_in_the_future + 95.492
Based on this information, our algorithm recommends the trading decision: Strong Sell. Remember that this is not investment advice, and only a statistical analysis. Do your own research.
Historic price development AMZN traded at $115.06 this Thursday October 20th, loosing $-1.3 or -1.13 percent since last week.
Looking back, over the last month, AMZN has been gaining.
Over the last year, it has been loosing $-50.85 or -44.19 percent.
